content: Our 2022 guidance is based on diluted weighted average common shares outstanding of approximately 57.3 million, a tax rate of 25%, the inclusion of the acquisitions closed in the first half of 2022, the exclusion of losses associated with start-up operations, which are not yet stabilized; the inclusion of management’s expectations of Medicare and Medicaid and reimbursement rates net of provider tax and with the primary exclusions coming from a onetime legal fee and stock-based compensation.
